sm.$description: Small container width. Use for narrow layouts and small screens such as mobile devices.

md.$description: Medium container width. Suitable for tablet layouts and compact desktop content areas.

lg.$description: Large container width. Intended for standard desktop layouts with typical content density.

xl.$description: Extra large container width. Use for wide desktop displays and content-heavy pages.

max.$description: Maximum container width. Use when constraining very wide layouts to maintain readable line lengths.
